section.name: Introduction
section.p: The Astro Runtime is middleware that makes it simple to use Virtual Observatory services. The current implementation supports development in any language with a XML-RPC, Java-RMI or basic HTTP library. It has been successfully used from Python, Perl, C, C++, Java, and Bash.

section.name: External Dependencies
section.p: Requires an installation of the Astro Runtime, which is provided as part of VODesktop

section.name: Status
section.p: The current Astro Runtime implementation is a stable release that is used in a number of projects. Any alterations to this public API will be made in a backwards-compatible manner.
